Text: Game was highly compressed, therefore the change in size from the archived release ;-) Any help seeding this would be highly appreciated. Enjoy!

LaserLok Protection???? Old Protection Methods/Software

Description for gcw: http://www.cdmediaworld.com/hardware/cdrom/cd_protections_laserlock.shtml

Official site: http://www.laserlock.com/
Support this greek company, they have made 2 good adventure games, Conspiracy 1 and 2, which are FMV, buy the games if you can guys.
This company is brave to embrace FMV in games. With the exception of perhaps Command Conquer (who has the high budget required for FMV), FMV went out of style in the late 90's.
